subject: Belmont Stakes

Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
I'll Have Another (Race Horse)
Doping (Sports)
Horse Racing
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: The New York State Racing and Wagering Board has made it mandatory for all horses running in the Belmont Stakes to be housed in a single highly secured barn beginning three days before the race.
snippet: The New York State Racing and Wagering Board has made it mandatory for all horses running in the Belmont Stakes to be housed in a single highly secured barn beginning three days before the race.
